damage_kinetic.title: Kinetic Penetrator
damage_kinetic.body: Kinetic penetrators are great against shields and armor but deal low damage.

damage_highexplosive.title: Explosively Formed Penetrator
damage_highexplosive.body: Explosively formed penetrators struggle against shields and armor but deal high damage.

damage_fragmentation.title: Shrapnel
damage_fragmentation.body: Shrapnel is very poor against both armor and shields but deals enormous damage.

damage_energy.title: Directed energy
damage_energy.body: Directed energy is equally effective against shields and armor and deals adequate damage.
